name: Apocalypse Mutant Erotica
description:
Embark on a road trip in a post apocalyptic world, threatened by mutants and scavengers. Make your choices, find supplies, fight your enemies and look for company; remember it´s the end of the world and make the best of that company, for you all know that each day could be the last.

AME is a free game with a deep sexual and comic tone, made by and for adult gamers. Just enjoy it and consider to donate and carry a second, longer and deeper part of the game.

And remember to play alone! The novel has no sound but very explicit images.
